ValidationRule.description: When Opportunity stage = 4, field Contract/ Price model is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ($User.Country != 'Sweden',
TEXT( Contract_Price_Model__c ) = '', OR ( TEXT(StageName) = '4 - Offer', TEXT(StageName) = '5 - Awarded' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contract/ Price model is required when stage = 4-Offer ORstage = 5-Awarded
